articles.title: About this site
articles.contents:
GENERAL INFORMATION
MILESIUS CONSULTING LTD is a company based in Cyprus by the ref.
Number: HE434212.
Our services consist of dedicated marketing, commercial - technical
expertise and advice, as detailed below, to support the Operating
Companies / Organizations in the identification, understanding,
assessment and setting of appropriate business approach of potential
opportunities for different range of products, solutions or services
that are willing to promote in the territory of Cyprus, European and
Global Markets
SHAREHOLDERS
• Lakis Christodoulou CABINET SECRETARIAL LTD
• Giorgos Protopapas
• Ioannis Ioannou
• Tassos Georgiou

articles.title: Milisious
articles.contents:
SERVICES DESCRIPTION
The Business Adviser provides the foreign Companies / Organizations,
the following services:
• Describe the economic, regulatory, geostrategic and political
environment.
• Detail the internal organizations and key decision-making processes of
potential customers and relevant key public institutions.
• Identify strategic opportunities, taking into account our customer’s
vision.
• Assess the presence, strengths and weaknesses of our customers
competitors.
• Upon request, assist in the organization of contacts with public
authorities/institutions, state or private institutions (e.g., export
credit agency), state or private companies (e.g., banks, investors,
industrial companies).
• Facilitating/ assisting foreign Companies/Organizations to participate
in several Tenders launched by the Cyprus Government.
